classSpec.desc: provides attributes describing the nature of a encoded scholarly intervention or interpretation of any kind.
assegna degli attributi che descrivono il carattere di un intervento critico codificato o interpretazione di altro tipo
proporciona atributos que describen la naturaleza de una intervención crítica codificada o una interpretación de cualquier tipo.

attDef.desc: signifies the degree of certainty associated with the intervention or interpretation.
corrisponde al grado di certezza associato all'intervento o interpretazione
significa el grado de certeza asociado con la intervención o la interpretación.
当該解釈や調整の確信度を示す．
indicates the agency responsible for the intervention or interpretation, for example an editor or transcriber.
indica il responsabile dell'intervento o interpretazione, per esempio un curatore o trascrittore
indica el agente responsable de la intervención o la interpretación, p.ej. un editor o un transcriptor.
当該解釈や調整の責任者を示す．例えば，編集者，翻訳者など．
attDef.valDesc: A pointer to an element in the document header that is associated with a person asserted as responsible for some aspect of the text's creation, transcription, editing, or encoding.

attDef.desc: indicates the nature of the evidence supporting the reliability or accuracy of the intervention or interpretation.
indica il carattere delle prove a sostegno dell'affidabilità o accuratezza dell'intervento o interpretazione
indica la naturaleza de las pruebas que sostienen la fiabilidad o precisión de la intervención o interpretación.
当該解釈や調整の信頼度や正確さを判断する証拠を示す．

valItem.desc: there is internal evidence to support the intervention.
there is external evidence to support the intervention.
the intervention or interpretation has been made by the editor, cataloguer, or scholar on the basis of their expertise.

attDef.desc: contains a list of one or more pointers indicating the sources which support the given reading.
attDef.valDesc: A space-delimited series of sigla; each sigil should correspond to a witness or witness group and occur as the value of the xml:id attribute on a witness or msDesc element elsewhere in the document.

remarks.p: The members of this attribute class are typically used to represent any kind of editorial intervention in a text, for example a correction or interpretation, or to date or localize manuscripts etc.
